burlap.behavior.stochasticgames.madynamicprogramming

Class MAQSourcePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.policy.Policy
      • burlap.behavior.stochasticgames.JointPolicy
        • burlap.behavior.stochasticgames.madynamicprogramming.MAQSourcePolicy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECorrelatedQJointPolicy, EGreedyJointPolicy, EGreedyMaxWellfare, EMinMaxPolicy

    public abstract class MAQSourcePolicy
extends JointPolicy
    An abstract extension of the JointPolicy class that adds a required interface of being able to a MultiAgentQSourceProvider. This extension is useful if the joint policy is derived from a set of multi-agent Q-values.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan
